register_phone_main: 請輸入欲註冊的手機號碼
register_success_sub_final: 您已成功註冊電話號碼，可以開始使用 CYBAVO 錢包來保障您的資產安全。
register_success_sub_setpin: 您已成功註冊電話號碼，現在只差一步，請立即前往設定 PIN 碼，以確保日後交易的安全。
setup_pin_sub: 日後交易均會使用到此 PIN 碼，例如:轉帳、建立錢包等，請記好密碼，切勿流露給他人。

setup_pin_success_sub: 您已成功設定 PIN 碼，可以開始使用 CYBAVO 錢包來保障您的資產安全。
register_phone_sub_setpin: 因為您是第一次註冊，為確保您的帳戶資產安全，請完成綁定電話號碼與設定 PIN 碼二步驟。
register_phone_sub_final: 我們加強了安全設置，請您綁定電話號碼，以確保您的帳戶資產安全。

different_address_info: 請注意 ETH 跟 BSC 的錢包地址不同, 不要把你的NFT資產打到錯誤的地址

transaction_reminder: 請用戶注意，切勿聽信他人指示操作，將資產轉移到你無法控制的地址或錢包中，交易一旦發生就無法還原，資產將會轉移出去。如果要進行加密貨幣資產變現(換成法幣)，請諮詢合法合規的交易所進行交易，避免與個人進行場外交易。
news_message: 自 2022/3/25, 所有使用錢包進行 BTC/ETH 交易的客戶將會被抽取 0.1% 的手續費, 手續費將在提領時被抽取
aml_warning: 與CYBAVO AML Solution Provider's List進行比較後，這是一個可疑的數字貨幣地址。如果你與這個地址互動，你可能會遭遇以下風險。
aml_checkbox_hint: 我知道有風險，無論如何繼續進行此交易。

walletconnect_disclaimer_2: For the purpose of linking CYBAVO Pte. Ltd. (“CYBAVO”) products, services or software to platforms with decentralized applications (“DeFi Platforms”), you may be provided with certain services offered by a third party, including links to third-party websites or resources such as virtual currency information and related applications (collectively referred to as “third-party services''). CYBAVO does not control, approve of, use and bears no responsibility for any third-party services (including, but not limited to, misleading, incomplete, erroneous, offensive, obscene or other objectionable services). By acknowledging this DISCLAIMER you acknowledge that CYBAVO provides access to third-party services for the sake of convenience and is not responsible for the websites, resources or links to services displayed on such websites. You further agree to take full liability and undertake all risks arising out of your use of or interactions with the websites or resources of any and all third parties.
walletconnect_disclaimer_3: You further acknowledge and agree that CYBAVO and its affiliates and subsidiaries bear no responsibility and no liability for the use, validity, quality, suitability, applicability and completeness of external DeFi platforms and/or third-party services, and makes no claims, guarantees, representations, warranties, terms, etc., whether implied or statutory, including any warranties of merchantability, title, non-infringement or fitness for a specific purpose. You understand and agree that the relevant DeFi platform and/or third-party services developers and/or suppliers shall be fully responsible for the technology and products provided by the DeFi platform and/or third-party services (including warranties and representations made by any DeFi platform and/or third-party services developer/supplier.) You also acknowledge and agree that CYBAVO and its subsidiaries are not developers, suppliers, resellers of or in any way affiliated with any external DeFi platforms and/or third-party services. All customer complaints or claims against the externally connected DeFi platforms and/or third-party services shall be settled solely between you and the DeFi platform and/or third-party services developers and/or suppliers. You hereby acknowledge and agree to hold harmless and exempt CYBAVO from any claims, complaints, errors, liabilities, losses, omissions arising from your use of these DeFi Platforms and/or third-party services even and especially when access to these DeFi Platforms and/or third-party services is provided via any CYBAVO products, services or software.
